alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 5:23PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fayette, Coweta, south central Fulton and northern Clayton Counties through 600 PM EST... At 523 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Fairburn to near Powers Crossroads, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Newnan, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, City of South Fulton, Peachtree City, Union City, Forest Park, Riverdale, College Park, Fairburn, Tyrone, Morrow, Palmetto, Senoia, Lake City, Moreland, Sharpsburg, Turin, East Newnan and Rex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for north central Georgia.
